channel.title: Need help understanding doors.cfg
channel.description:
Im running a Delta-based server and I need to know how to use the doors.cfg file I want to make all the doors be able to open but when added to the file they are not aligned with the door-frame or in the case of the double doors, open towards the middle. I want all the doors to open the right way, like normal doors, but this file is hard to understand.
Can anyone explain it to me? Here's the current code: [code] // XCoord YCoord Id FaceO FaceC Face State Height door = 3229 3240 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3230 3235 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3226 3223 1530 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 3226 3214 1530 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 3234 3207 1530 -1 0 0 1 0 door = 3238 3210 1533 -1 0 0 1 0 door = 3039 3297 8695 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 2726 3368 1533 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 2594 3102 1530 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 2603 3082 1533 -2 -1 -1 1 0 door = 2601 9482 2559 -2 -1 -1 1 0 door = 2597 3087 1600 -1 0 0 1 0 door = 2597 3088 1601 -3 0 0 1 0 door = 2584 3088 1600 -3 -2 -2 1 0 door = 2584 3087 1601 -1 -2 -2 1 0 door = 2593 9490 2154 -2 -1 -1 1 0 door = 2592 9490 2155 0 -1 -1 1 0 door = 3320 3467 1598 -1 0 0 1 0 door = 3320 3468 1599 -3 0 0 1 0 door = 3405 9895 3444 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 3431 9897 3445 -3 -2 -2 1 0 door = 3312 3234 3197 -3 -2 -2 1 0 door = 2816 3438 1530 -1 -2 -2 1 0 //new lumby doors door = 3268 3227 2882 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3268 3228 2882 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3246 3244 1530 -1 0 0 1 0 door = 3213 3222 12350 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3213 3221 12349 0 -1 -1 1 0 door = 3207 3217 12348 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3230 3291 1531 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3236 3284 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3241 3302 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3197 3282 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3189 3275 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3188 3272 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3180 3289 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3198 3282 1551 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3180 3289 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3181 3289 1551 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3174 3316 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3175 3316 1551 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3207 3210 1531 0 1 0 1 1 door = 3207 3227 1530 0 1 0 1 1 door = 3235 3198 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3247 3193 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3243 3216 12350 0 -1 -1 1 0 door = 3244 3216 12349 -1 -2 -3 1 0 [ENDOFDOORLIST] [/code]
EDIT: The inputting of the code into the foum messed up the spacing. Please try to understand it.

item.title: Need help understanding doors.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Dragon99999 Dragon99999
item.description:
@Dragon99999 wrote:

Im running a Delta-based server and I need to know how to use the doors.cfg file
I want to make all the doors be able to open but when added to the file they are not aligned with the door-frame or in the case of the double doors, open towards the middle. I want all the doors to open the right way, like normal doors, but this file is hard to understand.

Can anyone explain it to me?
Hereâ€™s the current code:

// XCoord YCoord Id FaceO FaceC Face State Height door = 3229 3240 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3230 3235 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3226 3223 1530 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 3226 3214 1530 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 3234 3207 1530 -1 0 0 1 0 door = 3238 3210 1533 -1 0 0 1 0 door = 3039 3297 8695 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 2726 3368 1533 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 2594 3102 1530 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 2603 3082 1533 -2 -1 -1 1 0 door = 2601 9482 2559 -2 -1 -1 1 0 door = 2597 3087 1600 -1 0 0 1 0 door = 2597 3088 1601 -3 0 0 1 0 door = 2584 3088 1600 -3 -2 -2 1 0 door = 2584 3087 1601 -1 -2 -2 1 0 door = 2593 9490 2154 -2 -1 -1 1 0 door = 2592 9490 2155 0 -1 -1 1 0 door = 3320 3467 1598 -1 0 0 1 0 door = 3320 3468 1599 -3 0 0 1 0 door = 3405 9895 3444 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 3431 9897 3445 -3 -2 -2 1 0 door = 3312 3234 3197 -3 -2 -2 1 0 door = 2816 3438 1530 -1 -2 -2 1 0 //new lumby doors door = 3268 3227 2882 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3268 3228 2882 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3246 3244 1530 -1 0 0 1 0 door = 3213 3222 12350 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3213 3221 12349 0 -1 -1 1 0 door = 3207 3217 12348 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3230 3291 1531 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3236 3284 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3241 3302 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3197 3282 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3189 3275 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3188 3272 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3180 3289 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3198 3282 1551 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3180 3289 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3181 3289 1551 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3174 3316 1553 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3175 3316 1551 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3207 3210 1531 0 1 0 1 1 door = 3207 3227 1530 0 1 0 1 1 door = 3235 3198 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3247 3193 1530 0 1 0 1 0 door = 3243 3216 12350 0 -1 -1 1 0 door = 3244 3216 12349 -1 -2 -3 1 0 [ENDOFDOORLIST]
